NightCommon.NightCommon_Area500_Briefing_Night_Commo: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0b61c4a76d4e441b8b24daf321c727b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Welcome back from your night expedition!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="13d7b7e79fcc47c1a0d9052969cb3a5b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]At laaast I can make the medicine...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and it's
all thanks to new blood here.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="01efea2b9c534a4aba1572355d5abab6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Well done!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6a878f37b82b4bf1a2ba4d43dd03d190" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'll have the medicine formulated by
morning.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just you wait and see,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="75a53041ee654397a7d092193112c248" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You're really getting the hang of the
whole "night expedition" thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e6aafb8f15b54cf792f4c57af5d1f5f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]With this [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can concoct a
medicine that's sure to cure the leaflings.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cea7c991e2da4adaa070c176551ab047" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You did it, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f117184a8a1e49f1b226fe0b93e8fae7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'll have the medicine done by morning.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Until then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] however,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] nobody comes near
my lab.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1b4dcad349ac4fddb9b4e991252c8379" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]what exactly is he doing in there?
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ae83c02870004dd599659747af61c8d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Welcome back from your night expedition!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="10d3ae7795594033b75882c6e81bbd6b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]At laaast I can make the medicine...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and it's
all thanks to new blood here.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="29ce41c285ff40ebbd629c7a736e822b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Well done!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="654a50e4e95e42b3afc29b6a880b3fa6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'll make the medicine.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yooou focus on
recovering the leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="227cb3dad06a4c04a827e7dabbdc96d4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You're really getting the hang of the
whole "night expedition" thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a8c051ebb3dc48e0b78a888b411f4143" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]With this [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can concoct a
medicine that's sure to cure the leaflings.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2e79a6acac4e4525bdb9938ec25f13fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You did it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Way to go.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now all you've
gotta do is rescue the leaflings.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
no pressure though, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e20d324f42304b6d9ea508ba1e590d6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the medicine doesn't expire,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
there's no need to rush,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b36407af45984ad18c0fc7db7f4062b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Did you see that, rookie?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's how [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
does it!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ee4fe4da4d824cbd9efaf6d76e4df8b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now we can make the medicine to
cure the leaflings.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1888f81fb8054488ab113063c30ad4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Nicely done, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That was very
impressive work.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="aadd0a8244954cc99d0322e352acdecf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Aw shucks, Captain...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Nah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that was
nothing...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]really.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="aec711da7de343d1b217afd29ff2f115" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'd say it's simply the obvious outcome
after one uses Bomb Rocks so...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
unsparingly.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="49b763b65a6e40cda7b35f9d0263bea7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It's also because the Glow Pikmin took no
notice of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="640dc68d783247a4a59e9f619a80b9d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I completed the objective,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] didn't I?
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]So if I'm not mistaken,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's nothing to
complain about,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] RIGHT?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c9894a19db374786868b20bad3d0831c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh my,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you weren't able to harvest the
glow sap,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] were you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="c5e2fdff0fef4b23a5d5d9da7b8ab8ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It could be because someone,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not to name
any names,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] was being a bit too stingy
with their item use.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f19312e3977946f0bd552e0e4821570e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Listen.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] If you work with your Rescue
Pup—really get 110 percent out of him—
I promise he can get you through anything!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="97d087b14db84153a7de0d461f77871c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's no need to feel discouraged.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You just need to get back out there and
harvest some more,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's all.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="829c9b5756d040feb4cf852ea0264929" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh my,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you weren't able to harvest the
glow sap,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] were you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1ca1065b956b4f2d90d6d128e4a025fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can you assist [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]
out there?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Please.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9e5196eb8bd443afa4003f15c491582a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hold on![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hold on![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've gotta be kidding
me here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not in charge of babysitting
this rookie!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d8868738f8dc4b9db68d348e0e641ea3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess a night expedition is too
much to handle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="64cbe4f399574652aea828f46b161147" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Wait...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Captain![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]not what I...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="64cbe4f399574652aea828f46b161147" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]Hey, rookie![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Look,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you really need me to,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'll go in your place.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to the rescue,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
no problem!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cc32d90354e041448e34e18c330e0e85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Welcome back from your night expedition!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="08441295048d4c0c9582c52a1bb8f765" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] were you able to gather some
Glow Seeds?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You can use them at night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but they're also helpful in caves.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="52294fbc2bdd46fc8e7340abb62a63cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Listen here, rookie![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just because they
look real tasty doesn't mean you should
do something dumb like eat 'em.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a899941b18ac40c699a55ca2c3a0851c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think the only person who believes
that particular color looks "tasty"
is you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c18e324b0ae742bc9b70baca3adcebce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You're really getting the hang of the
whole "night expedition" thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="fd6e0644246348199e127259a04d4bb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yeah, you're a regular night owl,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] hmm?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Aren't you tired after all that hard work?
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="499bb0122e1c40c8850af205443ab7ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Make sure you get a good night's sleep.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4982c1d211644cbc9f6a25b89f01b8b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Yeees, yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sleep is very important.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's
my professional opinion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="58756f1ec0e945848c7bada4c2007ad3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] your "professional opinion" won't
mean much if you stay up who-knows-how-
late with your nose in a book!
